# @components-kit/react

> Headless, accessible React components styled via data attributes. Bi-directional Figma design system sync — CSS ships instantly, no code, no redeploy, no maintenance.

@components-kit/react is an unstyled React component library with 22 accessible components. All components emit `data-*` attributes (`data-ck`, `data-variant`, `data-size`, `data-state`, `data-disabled`, etc.) and are styled entirely through an external CSS bundle synced with Figma.

Key patterns:
- **Headless**: Zero built-in styles. Styling via data attributes targeted by CSS.
- **`variantName` prop**: All components accept `variantName` to set `data-variant` for CSS variant selection.
- **Polymorphic `as` prop**: Heading, Text render as different HTML elements.
- **`asChild` composition**: Button, Badge merge props onto child elements via Slot.
- **Generic TypeScript**: Select<T>, Combobox<T>, MultiSelect<T>, Table<TData> support custom value types.
- **Controlled/Uncontrolled**: All interactive components support both modes.
- **Form integration**: Select, Combobox, MultiSelect render hidden inputs when `name` prop is provided.
- **WAI-ARIA compliant**: Full keyboard navigation and screen reader support.

Install: `npm install @components-kit/react`

Peer dependencies: react, react-dom (required); downshift, @floating-ui/react (Select/Combobox/MultiSelect); @tanstack/react-table (Table); sonner (Toast) — all optional except react/react-dom.

## Components

- [Alert](https://github.com/components-kit/packages/blob/main/libs/react/src/components/alert/README.md): Contextual feedback messages with heading, description, and action button
- [Badge](https://github.com/components-kit/packages/blob/main/libs/react/src/components/badge/README.md): Small status indicator for labels and counts, supports asChild
- [Button](https://github.com/components-kit/packages/blob/main/libs/react/src/components/button/README.md): Polymorphic button with loading, icons, asChild composition
- [Checkbox](https://github.com/components-kit/packages/blob/main/libs/react/src/components/checkbox/README.md): Boolean selection with indeterminate state
- [Combobox](https://github.com/components-kit/packages/blob/main/libs/react/src/components/combobox/README.md): Searchable select with filtering, async support, clearable
- [Heading](https://github.com/components-kit/packages/blob/main/libs/react/src/components/heading/README.md): Polymorphic heading (h1-h6)
- [Icon](https://github.com/components-kit/packages/blob/main/libs/react/src/components/icon/README.md): Icon wrapper with size variants (sm/md/lg)
- [Input](https://github.com/components-kit/packages/blob/main/libs/react/src/components/input/README.md): Text input with type variants
- [MultiSelect](https://github.com/components-kit/packages/blob/main/libs/react/src/components/multi-select/README.md): Multi-value select with tags, filtering, token separators
- [Pagination](https://github.com/components-kit/packages/blob/main/libs/react/src/components/pagination/README.md): Offset (numeric) and cursor-based pagination
- [Progress](https://github.com/components-kit/packages/blob/main/libs/react/src/components/progress/README.md): Linear progress bar, determinate/indeterminate
- [RadioGroup](https://github.com/components-kit/packages/blob/main/libs/react/src/components/radio-group/README.md): Radio button group with RadioGroupItem
- [Select](https://github.com/components-kit/packages/blob/main/libs/react/src/components/select/README.md): Dropdown select with keyboard navigation, type-ahead, groups
- [Separator](https://github.com/components-kit/packages/blob/main/libs/react/src/components/separator/README.md): Visual divider (horizontal/vertical)
- [Skeleton](https://github.com/components-kit/packages/blob/main/libs/react/src/components/skeleton/README.md): Loading placeholder with customizable dimensions
- [Slider](https://github.com/components-kit/packages/blob/main/libs/react/src/components/slider/README.md): Range input with keyboard and pointer drag
- [Switch](https://github.com/components-kit/packages/blob/main/libs/react/src/components/switch/README.md): Binary toggle control
- [Table](https://github.com/components-kit/packages/blob/main/libs/react/src/components/table/README.md): Data table with sorting, pagination, selection, expansion (TanStack Table)
- [Tabs](https://github.com/components-kit/packages/blob/main/libs/react/src/components/tabs/README.md): Accessible tabs for organizing content
- [Text](https://github.com/components-kit/packages/blob/main/libs/react/src/components/text/README.md): Polymorphic text element (p, span, strong, em, etc.)
- [Textarea](https://github.com/components-kit/packages/blob/main/libs/react/src/components/textarea/README.md): Multi-line text input with auto-resize
- [Toast](https://github.com/components-kit/packages/blob/main/libs/react/src/components/toast/README.md): Toast notification function with semantic markup (Sonner-based)

## Optional

- [Slot](https://github.com/components-kit/packages/blob/main/libs/react/src/components/slot/README.md): Internal utility for the asChild composition pattern
- [@components-kit/cli](https://github.com/components-kit/packages/tree/main/libs/cli): CLI tool for generating TypeScript variant types from your design system
